import React from 'react' import styles from './oftenCard.module.css' import { Context } from '../../pages/MainPage/MainPage' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function OftenOrder() { const OftOrdCard = useSelector(state => state.OftOrdCard.OftOrdCard) const oftenOrder = 'Часто заказывают' return (

{oftenOrder}

{OftOrdCard.map(miniCard =>

{miniCard.name}

{miniCard.price}
{miniCard.stock}
)}

Без свинины

Мы готовим из цыпленка и говядины

) } export default OftenOrder
